otherNames: Pokémon the Movie: The Power of Us, Gekijouban Pocket Monster: Minna no Monogatari, Pokémon the Movie: Everyone's Story
synopsis: Ash and Pikachu embark on a new journey to Fula City where the yearly Wind Festival takes place. There they meet new trainers and friends in order to later help save the city along with the mythical pokemon Zeraora.
